name: Dream Knight (Kaimatten)
description:
Gamejam game made for Portland Indie Game Squad (PIGSquad)

Theme: Dreams & Nightmares + Boss Fight

Dream Knight is a top-down action hack 'n slash featuring someone whose job is to beat up a bunch of Terrors across the Dreamscape.

Currently the game only has a short level and boss. Hopefully by the end of the gamejam I'll have a second boss.

I mostly wanted to learn how to use Construct, and how to program top-down movement. This seemed like a good excuse!

I'll be posting in the devlogs updates about the game, as well as on my Twitter - https://twitter.com/kaimatten

If development goes well and people seem to like the game, I may make it into a free 30-60 minute game, or even develop it up into a small, cheap game 2+ hours long.
